name: 4 Handmade Sterling Silver Rings - 18 mm - bright or oxidized finish
description:
These lovely little rings are handcrafted from 18 gauge sterling silver bead wire, gently hammered for a modern look.  The “beads” in the wire measure just under 1mm in diameter.

	These rings measure 18mm, about the size of a dime, and are available in a bright or oxidized finish.

	This listing is for 4 rings.  When you check out, please leave a note indicating whether you’d like the rings in bright silver or oxidized.

	Because most of my findings are made to order, please allow at least 7 business days for completion.

name: Sterling Silver Ear Wire Sampler
description:
This is a little sampler of two different ear wire styles, in two different silver finishes.

	You’ll receive 4 pairs of ear wires – two big loops, two arcs, in oxidized and bright finish sterling silver. These ear wires are hand formed from 20 gauge sterling wire. The ends and top of the loops are gently hammered for texture.

	Each ear wire measures approximately 3/4 inch (19 mm) from the top of the curve to the loop. The ends have been polished with a burr cup, and the wires are finished in a tumbler to work harden the wire and smooth the ends.

	Because most of my findings are made to order, please allow at least a few days from the time of your purchase to shipping. If you need something in a rush, please contact me to discuss availability. Thanks!

name: 50 Handmade Oxidized Silver Disc End Headpins - 2 in, 24 g
description:
These headpins are individually handcrafted from 24 gauge sterling silver wire. The ends are heatformed into balls, then hammered to produce flat discs – a slightly more modern look that complements larger beads and unusual shapes nicely. The headpins have been oxidized to a dark finish. The disc ends measure approximately 1 – 1.5 mm in diameter. Each of these headpins measures 2 inches (50 mm) in length.

	This listing is for 50 headpins. Please contact me if you’re interested in smaller or larger quantities.

	Because most of my findings are made to order, please allow at least a few days from the time of your purchase to shipping. If you need something in a rush, please contact me to discuss availability. Thanks!

name: 4 pairs Handmade Oxidized Silver Delicate Ear Wires
description:
This is my smallest, most delicate ear wire design.  These ear wires are handcrafted from 21 gauge sterling silver wire, gently hammered and oxidized to a dark finish.

	They measure about 8mm wide at their widest point, 8mm from the top of the curve to the bottom of the earring loop, and 16mm total from top to the bottom of the back part.  The second photo shows these next to my larger Long Loop and Big Loop wires.

	These little wires are lovely with pearls and other more delicate gemstone beads (as shown in the last photo).

	This listing is for 4 pairs (8 individual ear wires).

	Because most of my findings are made to order, please allow at least a few days for completion.  Please contact me if you have any questions.

name: 50 Oxidized Silver Ball End Headpins - 24g, 2 inches
description:
These headpins are individually handcrafted from 24 gauge fine silver wire. The ends are heatformed into balls, and then the pieces are oxidized to a dark finish (yes, fine silver will oxidize – it just takes a bit more time than sterling, and it’s much more pliable and easier to use in wire wrapping). The ball ends measure approximately 1 – 1.5 mm in diameter. Each of these headpins measures approximately 2 inches (50 mm) in length.

	The earrings pictured in the last photo (not included, simply shown to illustrate these findings in a finished design) are made with these headpins and my long loop earwires.

	This listing is for 50 headpins. Please contact me if you’re interested in smaller or larger quantities.

	Because most of my findings are made to order, please allow at least a few days from the time of your purchase to shipping. If you need something in a rush, please contact me to discuss availability. Thanks!
